Summary: Saw same thing in Independence, MO
divs: sighting detailsi saw a fireball-like\glowing object north of me as i was coming home around 8:30 pm. it definitely stood out; however, i was only able to see it for about 15 seconds until i went down a hill and couldn't see it any longer. from my estimation, it would have been somewhere north of 23rd st east of sterling. i just noticed from another report that someone else saw the same thing in independence last night.
trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Independence
There was one other sighting in Independence on or around October 21st 2010
